text: To display large amounts of information visually in a meeting, what object can be used to write it down on and display it on the wall?
To display a significant amount of data visually during a meeting, what device can be utilized to write it down and present it on the wall for all to view?
When needing to visually display large amounts of information during a meeting, what can be utilized to write this information down and project it onto a wall for all to see?
In a meeting where there is a large amount of information to be presented visually, what object could one use to write down the information and display it on the wall?
